room_title: Escape room "Slaycation" by Monkey Mayhem Escape Rooms in El Paso
room_description:
You and a group of your friends and family find an amazing deal on a rental vacation home nestled deep in the mountains. You imagine all of the s’mores you are going to make under the stars with your loved ones and without thinking twice you book your stay.
Shortly after arriving, something doesn’t seem right. A menacing note left by the property manager reveals his true intentions and you and your group must find a way to escape before he returns. You soon learn you are not alone. The spirits of his previous victims remain in the house and they want to help you to escape Jay’s trap. Can you identify the forgotten belongings of his victims and follow their clues to safety? Or will you meet your fate at the hands of Jay Jayson? Only time will tell… enjoy your slay!
